mpicxx   -std=c++0x -ftemplate-backtrace-limit=0  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/test_job_stream.dir/job_stream/test/test_serialization.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test_job_stream.dir/test/common.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test_job_stream.dir/test/test_example.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test_job_stream.dir/test/test_invoke.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test_job_stream.dir/test/tests.cpp.o  -o test_job_stream libjob_stream.a BOOST_SYSTEM_LIBRARY-NOTFOUND BOOST_THREAD_LIBRARY-NOTFOUND -ldl
